description: This is an HTML file serving as the front-end user interface for a database visualization web application. It includes layout, styling, and client-side JavaScript code for interacting with back-end APIs to list databases, tables, and display table data dynamically.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the server and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases by reloading from server.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the database to show its tables; loads tables when expanded.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a selected database and displays them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders the fetched data as an HTML table in the content area.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates a table cell with proper formatting depending on content type.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses a cell showing full content for long or complex data.
